Taapsee And Big B's 'Badla' Trailer Inspires Funny Memes & Internet Chose To Have A Field Day!
After a super collaboration for a project like Pink, Taapsee Pannu and Big B are back together and this time for a revenge drama.
Twitter
The trailer of Sujoy Ghosh trailer was unveiled yesterday and the reaction to the trailer proves that people are indeed looking forward to the film. While cinema lovers gave a big thumbs up to the film, a few chose to have a field day as they converted dialogues from the trailer into hilarious memes.
Screengrab
In case you haven't watched the trailer, watch it right here:
Social media is flooded with funny memes and three dialogues that made it to this meme-fest were:
1. "Jo Bhi Tum Mujhe Baataaoge, Woh Mere Liye Sach Hoga.."
2. "Main Isme Phasti Jaa Rahi Hoon.."
3. "Yeh Sab Bahot Carefully planned tha.."
In case you are wondering what all this has been about, read on!
